author: BBC News
title: Trump signs bill ordering release of Jeffrey Epstein files
description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.
content:
In a post on Truth Social on Wednesday, the president accused Democrats of championing the issue to distract attention from the achievements of his administration.
